caption.p: Fatty acid composition of the epoxidized linseed oil calculated by our approach compared to the theoretical values (see [ 3]). Abbreviations: PA, palmitic acid, (16:0); SA, stearic acid (18:0); EOA, epoxidized oleic acid, (18:1); ELA, epoxidized linoleic acid (18:2); ELNA, epoxidized linolenic acid (18:3).
